name: Get query for charge sumary
Query energy used
query:
SELECT charge_energy_used FROM public.charging_processes
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1

name: energy used
func:
flow.set('energyUsed', msg.payload[0].charge_energy_used)
return msg;

name: Start date drive

id last drive

start date drive

name: Get query for travel sumary
start Date charge

ORDER BY id DESC

name: end Date Charge
query:

ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1

name: id charge

ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1

name: end date charge
func:

return msg;

name: Energy travel
query:
SELECT (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0) * car.efficiency)
FROM public.drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE d.id = {{{msg.payload}}};
